attributes.action: The government to start taking global warming seriously
attributes.background: I want the government to start taking global warming seriously  and make the future better for our future generations as if we carry on ignoring thing will get worse

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about climate change, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You will need to give your full name in order to start a new petition. 

You might like to sign one of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/254607
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/245708
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/245140
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/258464
